entry.title: BIP32/43-based standard for Schnorr signatures & decentralized identity
entry.summary: Maxim received a message from Christopher Allen on February 5, 2021, expressing his interest in supporting discussion and implementation of the topic they had previously discussed. Christopher Allen mentioned his role as a co-author of the emerging W3C Decentralized Identifier standard and of the BTCR DID method. He is also the organizer of the Bitcoin Airgapped Wallet Community and the principal architect of Blockchain Commons. Additionally, he stated that some Patrons to Blockchain Commons were interested in this topic and may be willing to financially support some reference code. Maxim thanked Christopher and expressed his desire to talk to him further about the matter.
